member.name: CERT_ISSUER_SERIAL_NUMBER
member.summary: The CERT_ISSUER_SERIAL_NUMBER structure acts as a unique identifier of a certificate containing the issuer and issuer's serial number for a certificate.

member.name: CERT_ISSUER_SERIAL_NUMBER.Issuer
member.summary: A BLOB structure that contains the name of the issuer.

member.name: CERT_ISSUER_SERIAL_NUMBER.SerialNumber
member.summary: A CRYPT_INTEGER_BLOB structure that contains the serial number of the certificate. The combination of the issuer name and the serial number is a unique identifier of a certificate.
